Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Didn't know where to put but this seems to be ok. Does anyone else has the problem that he cannot download the game? I can login, see the downloads but after 30% it stops downloading...

Anyone can help?

Thanks

You are downloading the PC version from steam or someplace similar? It's about a 3Gb game. The symptoms you describe would seem to indicate a fragmented Windows disk that's running out of contiguous space.
